subject: Question About VAM Pro 2-Pack Mounting Brackets
description_text:
Hello,

I’m interested in ordering the Plus X P3-H3 and the VAM Pro 2-Pack. I only plan to use the haptics on the acceleration and brake pedals.

Could you please confirm if the VAM Pro 2-Pack comes with the correct mounting brackets for the acceleration and brake pedals, or if one of the included brackets is meant for the clutch instead? Cause this is what I've seen in the pictures, please do let me know if I'll need to add another bracket separately!

Thank you very much for your help!

Best regards,
Cosmin

conversations.body_text: Hi Cosmin Alin,    We will include all necessary mounting brackets for the three pedals—no additional purchases required. Please rest assured.
